profile.data: Jose is an Engineer who has worked in multiple projects and have 5 years of experience as a software developer; he started working with visual basic .net and then evolved into C# getting knowledge as in backend as frontend using frameworks like React; he has experience working with Node Js and Agile practices like Scrum and Kanban. For the last two years he has been working as full stack developer using C# and Node, occasionally leading different teams as tech lead support.

jobFunctions: Development of new functionalities and refactoring applications developed with NodeJs.
Write unit tests to prove the functionalities before the pull requests related to the developed functionalities.
Develop new functionalities and fix bugs in the platform, with web apps using Microsoft technologies.
Write unit tests to prove the functionalities before the deployments.
jobAchievements: Increase my knowledge in AngularJS and get knowledge in ReactJs and Webpack.
Apply my knowledge in Scrum and share it with the team.

jobFunctions: Develop REST APIs, with Windows services and web apps using Microsoft technologies.
Help to develop new functionalities and fix bugs in the platform(core of the business).
jobAchievements: Create a service to get more efficient information about the core of the business.
Help with the architecture design of a new sms dispatch platform.
Help to introduce and apply software programming best practices in the area.
Participant developing a new component to process files to dispatch messages more efficiently.

jobFunctions: Develop a web application to manage a home automation central and use it with a prototype made with a Raspberry Pi.
The application is able to dimmer and turn the light on/off; It can send orders to some appliance like tv and air conditioners as a remote control does.
jobAchievements: Learn new technologies as Python and Django.
Learn more frontend using stylus as css preprocessor.

data.title: Desarrollo basado en conceptos de Ingeniería de Software
